q: judicial review into the police handling of the investigation. The Times investigation cited several former NoW journalists stating that Andy Coulson had "actively encouraged" phone hacking. "In fact", the newspaper continued, an examination based on police records, court documents and interviews with investigators and reporters shows that Britain's revered police agency failed to pursue leads suggesting that one of the country's most powerful newspapers was routinely listening in on its citizens. This was followed by a Channel 4 "Dispatches" programme, in which it was alleged that Andy Coulson had personally listened to hacked messages. Two parliamentary select committees are involved in inquiries concerning the hacking

Mayor Tom Leppert 's statement: "The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. " Turns out the ceremony was the brainchild of Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway , a rebel key distributor. "We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it." Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network. . Jalen Rose had 18 and Jermaine O'Neal added 11 points and 11 rebounds for the Pacers, who were down just 61-59 at halftime after getting 33 from Reggie Miller . "I wish it was reversed," Reggie Miller said. The game is four quarters. I hate doing things early. I like doing it late. Allen Iverson scored 14 of Philadelphia's final 17 points in the third, including the last 10. He drilled a 17-footer, another long jumper and hit a 3-pointer to give the Sixers their biggest lead to that point
